channel.title: Calvary Chapel of Salt Lake-Audio
channel.itunes:subtitle: It's All About Jesus
channel.itunes:author: Terry Long
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to It's All About Jesus. This is the media outreach of Calvary Chapel Salt Lake. If you're searching for God, or if you have a personal relationship with Christ we are praying and hoping that we can minister to your souls with the Word of God. Senior Pastor Terry Long invites you to join him as he teaches verse by verse through the Bible. You can reach us at 1-801-264-9999 or on the web at www.calvaryslc.org.
channel.description: Pastor Terry invites you to join him as he teaches verse by verse through the Bible.You can reach us at 1-877-435-6837 or on the web at www.calvaryslc.org.
